subject: Hockey, Ice
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Brett Hull and the longtime Rangers Brian Leetch and Mike Richter will be inducted into the United States Hockey Hall of Fame on Oct. 10. The four-member class of 2008, announced Tuesday, also includes Cammi Granato, the career scoring leader for the United States women’s hockey team with 343 points in 205 games. She will be the first woman inducted into the hall.
